sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const CreateProfilePhil = () =>{ return(

CREATE PHILANTHROPIST PROFILE


Full Name setName(e.target.value)} /> Email address setEmail(e.target.value)} /> Which type of NGO are you? {setNGOType(e)}}> Tell us something about your work so far: setPrevWork(e.target.value)} />
What is your end goal? setEndGoal(e.target.value)} />
How do you plan to achieve this goal? setHowGoal(e.target.value)} />
What has been your impact on the environment and society? setImpact(e.target.value)} />
What are your funding needs? setFunding(e.target.value)}/>
) } export default CreateProfilePhil;
